name: Telegram Message Forwarder Bot
description: A Telegram forwarder bot, which can easily be deployed to Heroku.

FROM_CHATS.description: Chat ID of the channel/groups/chat from where to forward messages

TO_CHATS.description: Chat ID of thr chat where to forward messages

TELEGRAM_SESSION.description: Telegram session name, required if you want to login as user

ADVANCE_CONFIG.description: Advance config values in valid format.
